name: Refactor Code Smell
description: Analyze and refactor code smells in the current file

action.message:
Analyze the currently open file for code smells and suggest refactorings:

1. Identify code smells:
   - Long functions (>50 lines)
   - High complexity (cyclomatic complexity >10)
   - Duplicate code
   - Deep nesting (>4 levels)
   - Magic numbers/strings
   - Poor naming

2. For each smell found:
   - Explain the issue
   - Show the problematic code
   - Suggest a refactoring
   - Show the improved code

3. Prioritize by impact (high/medium/low)

4. Ask if I want to apply any refactorings
